description: When Justin Owen heard that Mark Long was done with his long break, he made sure he finagled his way into prime position to be partnered up, and now that the big day has arrived, he's ready to flaunt that position (plus a few more). He knows all about Mark's legendary cock, and he's chomping at the bit to take it for a test spin. For his part, Mark is ready to fuck and Justin seems like a perfect candidate. With his bubble butt and his lag of a gag reflex, Mark is sure Justin is just the kind of cock pig he needs to start his comeback, and Justin is sure that he has what it takes to make Mark 'cum back'. Seems like a perfect match.   Enjoy!
title: Mark Long & Justin Owen
